original_text:
My frame was not hidden from you,
when I was being made in secret,
    intricately woven in the depths of the earth.
korean_text: 내가 은밀한 데서 지음을 받고 땅의 깊은 곳에서 기이하게 지음을 받은 때에 나의 형체가 주의 앞에 숨겨지지 못하였나이다

sentences.original_text: My frame was not hidden from you
when I was being made in secret
intricately woven in the depths of the earth
